author: potuz
content: Oh thanks so much! I should get back to simplifying the CL spec as we discussed instead of wasting pandaops time with RLNC

author: potuz
content: I think that to test interop anything goes. If you do get a branch that can finalize on Kurtosis and only lodestar, with some payloads missing, I'll be happy to add the payload on a prysm branch to test interop with you guys
